articles.title: Twitch vs. Facebook Gaming: How Should You Live Stream Video Games? - PCMag AU
articles.description: Whether you’re a viewer or a streamer, picking the right video game live streaming service is crucial. Amazon’s Twitch reigns supreme, but Facebook Gaming presents a serious challenge. Here's how to choose.
articles.content: Amazons Twitch and Facebook Gaming, arguably the two biggest names in video game live streaming after YouTube shuttered its standalone gaming app, come from two dominant tech corporations. If Jeff Be… [+10021 chars]

articles.content: Joplin is a free and open-source competitor to Evernote, and it's among the best note-taking apps you'll find. In the note-taking app category, Evernote set a high bar for features and functionality,… [+10821 chars]
